original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū khambhakatā antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁kham bha kat ā ▁ antara ghar e ▁gacchanti ▁pe
▁na ▁kham bha kat o ▁ antara ghar e ▁gam issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁na ▁kham bha kat ena ▁ antara ghar e ▁gantabb aṃ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ekato vā ubhato vā khambhaṁ katvā antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ekato ▁vā ▁ubhato ▁vā ▁kham bh aṃ ▁katvā ▁ antara ghar e ▁gacchati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
